id: This is a hidden unique ID for the dataset used for the Catalog UI.
objname: Object name is the editable database oject such as a feature class in the database.
title: Data Catalog Field Explanations
description: Plain language description of what this data catalog item is.
office_owner: The branch, division, or office responsible for updating and maintaining the dataset.
contact_email: Email address of the best point of contant for this dataset.
topics: Topics can be added to help group datasets by theme. Example: planning
keywords: Keywords help with search. Example: RMP

extent._comment: extent is OPTIONAL - this may be used for a future feature of the site.

_comment: projection is OPTIONAL - this may be used for a future feature of the site.
update_frequency: How often the dataset updates: monthly, daily, etc.
status: Dataset status: authoritative, planned, depreciated, etc.
public_web_service: This is the URL to the public web servive for the dataset.
internal_web_service: The URL of the internal web service for the dataset.
data_standard: URL to the data standard for the dataset.
access_level: Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) category or "PUBLIC" if none.
notes: OPTIONAL field to use in the rare case that there is a need to share additional information here about this dataset to the user.

attributes.name: RMP_ID
attributes.label: RMP Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the RMP area.

notes.title: BLM Resource Management Plan Boundaries
notes.description: Polygon boundaries of BLM Resource Management Plans.
notes.notes: Used in NEPA and land use planning program-wide.

attributes.name: RMP_ID
attributes.label: RMP Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the RMP area.

notes.title: BLM Wildfire Perimeters
notes.description: Perimeters of wildfires intersecting BLM-managed lands.

attributes.name: FIRE_ID
attributes.label: Fire Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the fire event.

attributes.name: FIRE_NAME
attributes.label: Fire Name
attributes.description: Common name of the fire, if assigned.

attributes.name: ACRES_BURNED
attributes.label: Acres Burned
attributes.description: Total acres burned within the fire perimeter.

attributes.name: DISCOVERY_DATE
attributes.label: Discovery Date
attributes.description: Date the fire was first discovered.
